item.description:
Who doesn't love this movie? I know I'm posting this way in advance....but nothing beats this flick!

Come see the tale of freespirited Holly Golightly, a ny "socialite" who befriends her writer neighbor, Paul (aka Fred). Probably one of Audrey Hepburn's best.

Starts at 11am, but I'm sure this one is going to be popular so I'll be there at 10:30.

***UPDATE*** We'll meet at 10:30am in the lobby and go inside as soon as the doors open, so please be on time to get seats. Those of you who were at "A Christmas Story" know that these things can get packed.



Mimosas are $2!!!

Natalie is the contact. 512-413-4119

http://imdb.com/title...

this one's for you, chris
http://www.youtube.co...
item.name: Movies and Mimosas - Breakfast at Tiffany's
